title: [Large-scale] Trial-and-Error-Based Scientific Problem-Solving Training to Leverage Inverted Learning Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational grasp of scientific principles and problem-solving procedures
context.additional_context: Practical training environment using mobile-based VR simulations, considering limited technological infrastructure

learning_goals: Learners must be able to solve inverse problem scenarios with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Learners must derive at least three problem-solving strategies through a trial-and-error process
Learners must improve the persistence of scientific reasoning by 50% by applying the principle of partial reinforcement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
